verses.kjv: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God: and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him.
verses.ct: Everyone who trusts that Jesus is the Christ has been born of God. And anyone who loves the Father also loves the Father's children.

verses.kjv: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God, and keep his commandments.
verses.ct: Here is how we can be sure we love God's children: when we love God and follow his commands.

verses.kjv: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments: and his commandments are not grievous.
verses.ct: Because loving God means obeying his commands — and his commands are not burdensome.

verses.kjv: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
verses.ct: Everyone who is born of God conquers the world. And the victory that conquers the world is our faith.

verses.kjv: Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.ct: Who is it that conquers the world? Only the person who trusts that Jesus is the Son of God.

verses.kjv: This is he that came by water and blood, even Jesus Christ; not by water only, but by water and blood. And it is the Spirit that beareth witness, because the Spirit is truth.
verses.ct: This is the one who came through water and blood — Jesus Christ. He came not through water alone, but through both water and blood. The Spirit testifies to this, because the Spirit is truth.

verses.kjv: For there are three that bear record in heaven, the Father, the Word, and the Holy Ghost: and these three are one.
verses.ct: There are 3 who testify in heaven: the Father, the Word, and the Holy Spirit — and these 3 are one.

verses.kjv: And there are three that bear witness in earth, the Spirit, and the water, and the blood: and these three agree in one.
verses.ct: There are also 3 that testify on earth: the Spirit, the water, and the blood — and these 3 are in agreement.

verses.kjv: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater: for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son.
verses.ct: We accept human testimony, but God's testimony carries even greater weight. And this is God's testimony — what he has declared about his Son.

verses.kjv: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself: he that believeth not God hath made him a liar; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son.
verses.ct: Anyone who trusts in the Son of God carries this testimony within themselves. But anyone who does not trust God has essentially called him a liar, because they have rejected what God has declared about his Son.

verses.kjv: And this is the record, that God hath given to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.
verses.ct: This is the testimony: God has given us eternal life, and this life is found in his Son.

verses.kjv: He that hath the Son hath life; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life.
verses.ct: Whoever has the Son has life. Whoever does not have the Son of God does not have life.

verses.kjv: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God; that ye may know that ye have eternal life, and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God.
verses.ct: I have written these things to you who trust in the name of the Son of God so that you can know with certainty that you have eternal life, and so that you will continue trusting in the name of the Son of God.

verses.kjv: And this is the confidence that we have in him, that, if we ask any thing according to his will, he heareth us:
verses.ct: This is the confidence we have when we approach him: if we ask for anything that aligns with his will, he listens to us.

verses.kjv: And if we know that he hear us, whatsoever we ask, we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him.
verses.ct: And if we know that he listens to us in whatever we ask, then we know we already have what we requested from him.

verses.kjv: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death, he shall ask, and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death. There is a sin unto death: I do not say that he shall pray for it.
verses.ct: If someone sees a fellow believer committing a sin that doesn't lead to death, they should pray, and God will give that person life. This applies to sins that don't lead to death. But there is a sin that leads to death — I'm not saying you should pray about that one.

verses.kjv: All unrighteousness is sin: and there is a sin not unto death.
verses.ct: All wrongdoing is sin, but there is sin that does not lead to death.

verses.kjv: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself, and that wicked one toucheth him not.
verses.ct: We know that no one born of God keeps on sinning. The one born of God guards themselves, and the evil one cannot touch them.

verses.kjv: And we know that we are of God, and the whole world lieth in wickedness.
verses.ct: We know that we belong to God, but the entire world lies under the control of the evil one.

verses.kjv: And we know that the Son of God is come, and hath given us an understanding, that we may know him that is true, and we are in him that is true, even in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.
verses.ct: We also know that the Son of God has come and has given us the ability to understand, so that we can know the one who is true. And we are in the one who is true — in his Son Jesus Christ. He is the true God and eternal life.

verses.kjv: Little children, keep yourselves from idols. Amen.
verses.ct: Dear children, guard yourselves against idols. Amen.
